intro: The system is designed to manage the process of powerlifting competitions in online mode, simulating the operation of a local network.
It allows multiple devices to work simultaneously and display live competition results in real time.
scenariosTitle: The system supports the following usage scenarios:

admin.title: Admin
text: The main device used to manage data and control the operation of all clients.
It allows athlete registration, session and flight management, entering and displaying live changes, as well as pre- and post-competition documentation.

clientsIntro: The system supports an arbitrary number of client devices, which can operate according to the following scenarios:

clients.title: Competition Protocol
clients.text: Displays current competition protocols, results, and result predictions for the current session or weight category.

clients.title: Attempt Order
clients.text: Displays the order of athlete attempts based on declared weight, draw results, and other rules.

clients.title: Plate Loading Order
clients.text: Shows the plate loading sequence for the athlete on the platform and the next athlete.

clients.title: Information Board
clients.text: An information display for spectators showing details about the athlete currently on the platform.

clients.title: Timer
clients.text: Controls attempt time, countdowns, and time until the start of competition.

clients.title: Weigh-in
clients.text: A separate client for judges responsible for athlete weigh-ins.

footer: All weigh-in data is transferred directly into the system without the need to enter it manually through the main Admin device.
